pullRequest.body:
Provide continuity criteria for functions `X â†’ Bool`
and, more generally, `X â†’ Y`, where `Y` has discrete topology.

---
Cleaning up old branches.

Thanks for the changes: I like the `Bool` lemmas!

What do you think of adding also the analogous lemma with `false`?

I am not sure if it will be useful and I do not want to push for an extra lemma either.  I'll leave a further suggestion, but will not mention this anymore!
```lean
lemma continuous_bool_rng [TopologicalSpace X] {f : X â†’ Bool} (b : Bool) :
    Continuous f â†” IsClopen (f â»Â¹' {b}) := by
  cases b <;>
    rw [continuous_discrete_rng, Bool.forall_bool, IsClopen, â† isOpen_compl_iff, â† preimage_compl,
      Bool.compl_singleton]
  Â· rw [Bool.not_false, And.comm]
  Â· rw [Bool.not_true]
```
The right way to do it is to add `Bool.forall_bool' {p : Bool â†’ Prop} (b : Bool) : (âˆ€ x, p x) â†” p b âˆ§ p !b` and use it here. I'll do it tomorrow.

```suggestion
/-- A function to a discrete topological space is continuous if and only if the preimage of every
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Topology/Constructions): add `continuous_bool_rng`
